name: Grove of Return
description: Tucked beyond sight and memory, this small grove feels impossible. No insects buzz. No leaves fall. The ground glows faintly beneath your feet, and a strange fruit pulses at its center — as if waiting for you to find it, again.

story_actions.story_text: Touch the bark of a tree etched with unknown symbols. They shift slightly under your hand.
A voice hums from beneath the roots — not in words, but emotion. You feel longing, sorrow, and awe.
Meditate in the clearing. Time becomes strange. For a moment, you are the fruit. The grove watches you grow.
Search beneath the roots — you find a buried tablet, pulsing with warmth. It names you, though the letters rearrange.
The fruit pulses once more. It waits for your hand. The grove is silent — watching.
You touch the fruit. It becomes light. You do not fade — you are drawn inward. The grove vanishes behind your eyes.
